content: Tuesday nightFootball Prediction Contest!Oddshttps://sportsbet.io/sports/event/soccer/england/efl-cup/gillingham-fc-v-southampton-fc-64945ee916bba068675b5da1Rulesa.  Predict the winner (1x2) (Southampton, Gillingham or Draw)(must get correct to proceed)b.  Predict the Final score (1x2)  (must get correct to proceed)c.  First team to score? (Southampton, Gillingham or None)(must get correct to proceed)d.  Total Corners 10.5? (Over or Under)  (must get correct to proceed)e.  Goals scored in both halves? (Yes or No)   (must get correct to proceed)f.  Tiebreaker:  Predict the MINUTE of the 1st Goal Scored (doesn't matter which team scores)Examplea. Southamptonb. 2-1c. Southamptond. Undere. Yes  f. 30'Prize2 mBTC Free Bet(Small print)* Must be active in Gambling and/or Gambling discussion (some exceptions) *** The declared winners are final and up to my discretion ***** Tiebreaker will include a 10 minute handicap for quicker prediction ***

comments.author: jeremypwr
comments.body: Sportsbet.io has been kind enough to sponsor my Prediction Contests and Promos for a while now.Sportsbet.io is a sports betting website; therefore these Prediction Contests and Promos are catered to those who actually bet on/discuss sports.Given the nature of my threads, please do not bother making a Prediction if you have not read the OP and qualify.If you are unsure if you qualify, just shoot me a PM.  Thank you for your cooperation.
